= Requirements =

To be able to use this script you're going to need the following:

  * astrometry.net-0.38.tar.bz2 from http://astrometry.net/use.html
  * WCSlib from http://www.atnf.csiro.au/people/mcalabre/WCS/
  * the Gnu Scientific Library  from ftp://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gsl/ 
  * the zenity GUI dialogs package http://octave.sourceforge.net/zenity/
